data.enText: a chemical element. Sodium is a soft silver-white metal that is found naturally only in compounds , such as salt.

tr: a silvery soft waxy metallic element of the alkali metal group
occurs abundantly in natural compounds (especially in salt water)
burns with a yellow flame and reacts violently in water
occurs in sea water and in the mineral halite (rock salt)

value.def: Sodium is a silvery-white chemical element which combines with other chemicals. Salt is a sodium compound.

example.ex: The fish or seafood is heavily salted with pure sodium chloride.
example.tran: 鱼或海鲜被抹了厚厚的纯盐腌制起来。

example.ex: ...one level teaspoon of sodium bicarbonate powder.
example.tran: 一平茶匙碳酸氢钠粉末

value.def: Sodium lighting gives out a strong orange light.

example.ex: ...the orange glow of the sodium streetlamps.
